SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

javax.servlet.http.annotation
Annotation Type Servlet

@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Servlet

Annotation used to declare a servlet that the container then processes at deployment time and makes available as per the url mapping rules.

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String[] urlMappings
          url-mapping for the servlet
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String description
          Description of the servlet
 java.lang.String icon
          The icon defined for the servlet
 InitParam[] initParams
          Init params for the servlet
 int loadOnStartup
          Define load on startup for the servlet
 java.lang.String name
          Name of the servlet
 

Element Detail

urlMappings

public abstract java.lang.String[] urlMappings
url-mapping for the servlet

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Name of the servlet

Default:
""

loadOnStartup

public abstract int loadOnStartup
Define load on startup for the servlet

Default:
-1

initParams

public abstract InitParam[] initParams
Init params for the servlet

Default:
{}

icon

public abstract java.lang.String icon
The icon defined for the servlet

Default:
""

description

public abstract java.lang.String description
Description of the servlet

Default:
""
